Text.Page: There are argon...thingamajigs...that I suspect impact the development of the iteris shards. I need to study one, but I'm no venator. Can you head to the Southern Teleport Platform and send me a message when it's safe?<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"How do I send a message to you?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

The teleport platform's harmonics align with the one in Kanstria. Couldn't be easier.

Once the area is secure, let me know and I'll head there.

(There's no obvious sign of danger.)

(You should let Shirka know.)

Surprise! I'm not Shirka.

My apologies, but my orders are to keep her alive at all costs. This area is too dangerous for her, so I came in her place."Fine. What's the next step?"

The {@Rgn:49002} south of here project beams of energy toward organic structures we're calling cyasmana pods.

Shirka wants a fragment from one of these pods. Destroy one, collect a piece, and return to me.

That looks perfect. Shirka will be pleased.

You can use the teleport platform to return to Kanstria whenever you wish.
The cyasmana pods are under the {@Rgn:49002}. Just follow the beam of light in the sky. Can't miss it.

This sample should prove most illuminating.

I hope you didn't go to too much effort."Well, kelbas did ambush me."

There were kelbas in the pod? That's just...weird.

Perhaps they're the ones behind the improvements to the shards. I'll have to give this some thought. In any case, thanks for your help!
